homepage.intro: Hello, my name is Artur Marbach and I live in Hamburg. I am a DevSecOps Engineer with experience in building stable and scalable infrastructures.
Enthusiasm: Experience with Docker, CI/CD, Linux, multi-container deployments, and monitoring for stable and automated operations.
Commitment: I continuously explore new tools and technologies, such as AWS, to enhance my skills and execute projects successfully.
Skill Development: Knowledge in automation, containerization, CI/CD, monitoring, and cloud (AWS). Regular use of Docker and Linux for stable, scalable projects.
Portfolio: In my portfolio, I present selected DevOps and container projects that I implemented using Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and Linux infrastructure. All projects are available on GitHub – take a look at the repositories to see how I build stable infrastructure, automate processes, and deploy reliably.
development1.description: Deployment of an API including a database. Focus on stable infrastructure, containerized services, and reproducible setups.
development3.description: Deployment of a containerized application with automated builds and releases. Focus on stable cloud infrastructure, reproducible deployments, and secure operations.
development4.description: Setup of a monitoring system to visualize system metrics and logs. Project demonstrates configuring observability infrastructure.
development5.description: Deployment of a multi-container application with clear separation of frontend and backend. Focus on reliable deployments and maintainable infrastructure.
development6.description: Currently working on deploying the existing API with Terraform on AWS. The project helps to practically learn infrastructure automation and cloud deployments.
development7.description: Lightweight, containerized setup for a Minecraft Java Edition server using Docker and Docker Compose.
development8.description: A Docker Compose setup deploying WordPress with a MySQL database — featuring persistent data, configurable environment variables, and easy deployment.
development9.description: Deployment of a containerized Django e-commerce shop with PostgreSQL, secure configuration via environment variables, and management through the admin panel.
development10.description: Conducting targeted security tests to identify critical web vulnerabilities. The goal was to realistically assess security risks and derive secure development practices.
Communication: Contact me using this form. I’m eager to learn about your requirements, ideas, and projects, and I look forward to contributing with my DevSecOps expertise.
and agree to the processing of my data a: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined
